definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[קבב]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. t.arono0 arch, dome (hence ‘al-cove’), vaulted tent, esp. tent of honour Goldziher:ZMG xlvii (1893), 74 f. Jacob:Beduinenleben (2) 86, 245; Syr. qub=ah;un vault, dome, qbobo0 id., vaulted tent Psalm:3466 b; so NH [[קוּבָּה]], specif. lupanar; Targum [[קוּבְּתָא]] vault (esp. vaulted heavens); perh. also As. ḳabâbu, sheild).
